---
title: "WINK taxonomic report"
output: 
  html_document
params:
  n: NA
  brackenData: NA
---

```{r, include=FALSE}
# setup shared data object
# all data input is from brackenData()
require(crosstalk)
require(dplyr)
source("render_DT.R") # this is also, like report.Rmd, copied to a temp file in the app

sd <- SharedData$new(params$brackenData)

```



```{r, include=TRUE, eval=TRUE}

datatable(
  sd,
  options = list(dom = 'Pfrtip', columnDefs = list(list(
    searchPanes = list(show = FALSE), targets = 2:6
  ))),
  extensions = c('Select', 'SearchPanes'),
  selection = 'none'
)

```
